sentences.sContent: We met a band of vagrant beggars there .
sentences.sContent_eng: We met a band of vagrant beggars there .
sentences.sCn: 我们在那里遇到了一伙流浪的乞丐。

sentences.sContent: Alternate status: life as a homeless vagrant really isn?t so bad after all. Why did I go to college again?
sentences.sContent_eng: Alternate status: life as a homeless vagrant really isn?t so bad after all. Why did I go to college again?
sentences.sCn: 我现在觉得，做一个无家可归的流浪者没有什么不好啊。 为什么我还要回学校继承上学呢？

sentences.sContent: Port City North Carolina: During a routine camp out| a local vagrant discovers plans for an invasion in America.
sentences.sContent_eng: Port City North Carolina: During a routine camp out| a local vagrant discovers plans for an invasion in America.
sentences.sCn: 港口城市北卡罗来纳州：在例行营地| 一个当地的流浪者发现了在美国入侵的计划。

synos.tran: 游民；流浪者；无赖；漂泊者

words.tran: 流浪的；流浪者的；浪荡的；漂泊的
流浪；漂泊；思想游移不定

trans.tranOther: someone who has no home or work, especially someone who begs
